channel.title: Cloud Services on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Cloud Services on FinanClub

item.title: 1188 HPE
item.description: score:1188 Chances: Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) announced a partnership with phoenixNAP to expand its Bare Metal Cloud platform, which could potentially boost the company’s cloud services revenue. The adoption of HPE ProLiant RL300 Gen11 servers with energy-efficient processors from Ampere Computing may enhance HPE’s cloud-native workloads performance and energy efficiency.

item.title: 1114 GOOG
item.description: score:1114 Chances: Alphabet’s cloud segment grew 28% annually and posted its first profitable quarter, indicating potential growth opportunities in the cloud services business. The mixed results from Q1, with the advertising segment declining marginally but the cloud segment showing growth, suggest that investors are betting on Alphabet’s AI hype, which has contributed to the stock’s gain of 44% this year.
